name: WordProblems
0:
”Alexa, Ask Word Problems to ask a problem”
”Repeat”
”What is the correct answer”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: word problems
des:
Solving word problems allow children to apply math concepts to solve real world problems. With this skill, Alexa can help your child practice solving word problems and in the process learn and improve math problem solving skills.
Word problems are an important tool for children to relate math to real world problems, and often bring together various math concepts into one problem. It helps your child learn to comprehend the problem when spoken, think visually and use creativity to solve the word problems.

Once you ask Alexa - Word Problems skill to ask a word problem, she can keep asking different problems till you choose to stop.

You can ask her to repeat the question anytime, ask for the correct answer or ask for a different question.

You can also ask Alexa the score, when she will tell you how many questions were correctly answered out of all she has asked in the current interaction.
